Sentencas: Limited overall efficiency and excessive complexity can hinder the competitiveness of biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: To overcome these problems, hydrocarbons direct internal reforming is analysed as a strategy to increase efficiency and reduce system complexity.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: To the same end, two biosyngas heating-up strategies are compared: catalytic partial oxidation and afterburner off gases utilization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: A comprehensive approach combining thermodynamic equilibrium calculations, experimental measurements, and system modelling was used.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: The gas cleaning unit should operate at 400 degrees C to decrease H2S and HCl below 1 ppmv.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: A tar amount of 120-130 g Nm(-3) dry biosyngas for woodchips and 190 g Nm(-3) for straw pellets was measured and 2-methoxyphenol, hydroxyacetic acid and hydroxyacetone were selected as representative compounds.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: With direct internal reforming the cathode air flow rate decreases from approximately 90 kg h(-1) to 60 kg h(-1).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: This leads to an increase of around 1% point in electrical efficiency and of even 5-6% points in thermal efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: Direct internal tar reforming seems therefore an advantageous strategy.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an improved integrated biomass gasifier solid oxide fuel cell micro combined heat and power system

Sentencas: The catalytic partial oxidation unit increases the system overall efficiency but reduces the electric efficiency from roughly 38%-30% and is therefore not advised.
